channel.title: Go Humble! RSS SOFTWARE
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle software bundles!

item.title: No-Code No Problem Game Dev Bundle
item.description: DRM-Free Assets & A No-Code GameDev Course!
item.content:encoded: Stuck in a time crunch on your latest project? Kick your development cycle into hyperdrive with the new No-Code, No Problem Game Dev Bundle from GDevelop. Save time, money, and effort with this curated library of unique and helpful DRM-FREE asset packs designed to deliver fast, high-quality results. Get 6 months of GDevelop Silver for free, along with amazing collections like the Pixel Dark Fantasy Bundle, Sci-Fi Space Village, and more. Explore the GDevelop Master Course and learn how to make a game quickly, no coding required! Bring your next game to life, and help support the Prevent Cancer Foundation with your purchase!

item.title: FlippedNormals Extreme Add-ons Bundle for Blender & ZBrush
item.content:encoded:
Get quality add-ons for Blender and ZBrush with our latest bundle! We’ve teamed up with the pros at FlippedNormals to deliver a gigantic library of powerful tools for your next game development project. Add new life to your creative work with standout assets like Real-time Hair ZBrush Plugin, Physical Starlight and Atmosphere, Easy Mesh ZBrush Plugin, and more. Get the add-ons you need to bring color and individuality to your next project—and help support Extra Life with your purchase!

Free lifetime updates are not included in the bundle purchase. All creators have included coupon codes in the bundle, so you can purchase directly from their shop at a discounted price to receive updates and full support.

item.title: 3D Artist Tools & Brushes Mega Bundle
item.content:encoded: Calling all game developers, graphic artists, and budding printmakers—create your art using the elite tools in this awesome library. Our latest Mega Bundle offers 50+ collections of tools, assets, plugins, and brushes fit for any style of work. Use industry-leading resources like the Bags & Pouches Collection and Hard-Surface Kitbash Collection. Get the assets you need to bring your next project to life, and help support Save the Children with your purchase!

item.title: Sound Explosion: 100+ Packs of Royalty Free Music & Sound Effects
item.content:encoded: Create the perfect audioscape for your game, film, or creative project with this amazing bundle of royalty-free sounds from Audio Hero! This massive library features 100+ samples, tracks, instruments, and more. Get the tools you need to achieve the sound you’re looking for with unique audio assets like the Global Creator Mix, YouTube Creator’s SFX, and YouTube Creator’s Music. Pay what you want and help support Children's Miracle Network Hospitals with your purchase!

item.title: Biggest Graphics Bundle 2025
item.content:encoded: Are you a game designer looking to level up your project’s visuals? Then you need The Biggest Graphics Bundle of 2025 by Eldamar Studio. Get 70,000+ overlays, backgrounds, patterns, textures, and more from 80+ asset packs—standouts include 7700+ High-Resolution Backgrounds Bundle, 3000+ Space Backgrounds and Textures Collection - Vol.1, and 2500+ Massive Photo Overlays Bundle. Get professional-quality tools compatible with Photoshop, Lightroom, Affinity, Premiere, After Effects, Final Cut, DaVinci Resolve, Unreal Engine, Unity, GIMP, and others—and help support Save the Children with your purchase!

item.title: Lights, Camera, Movavi! The Photo & Video Dream Kit
item.content:encoded: Master the arts of film and photography with our latest software bundle from the experts at Movavi Studios. The Lights, Camera, Movavi Bundle offers 10+ tools for original photo and movie creation, including high-powered development software and additional asset packs to help you bring your vision to life. Get hot software like Movavi Video Editor 2023 & Movavi Photo Editor 2024—and help support Oceana with your purchase.

item.title: Level Up: 5K World Building Assets
item.content:encoded: Build the game of your dreams in any setting or scenario with our Level Up: 5K World Building Assets Bundle. The possibilities are endless—this massive library has everything from medieval to cyberpunk, gothic to ‘80s-inspired styles. Bring life and style to your projects with assets that let you create specialized hospitals, atmospheric taverns, underground subways, and more. Don’t wait—grab this jam-packed collection of high-quality 3D assets today and support a charity of your choice with your purchase!

item.title: Become a Design Pro with Janets
item.content:encoded: Curious about Adobe but don’t have the tools to get started? Then you need our newest Software How-To Bundle! Become a design pro with help from the experts at Janets. Learn how to master essential Adobe software with lessons like Adobe After Effects CC, Photoshop Masterclass, Adobe Lightroom Masterclass, and 20+ other courses. Get the skills and knowledge you’re looking for from easy-to-follow lessons—and help support Hello World with your purchase.

item.title: Ultimate World Building Asset Bundle
item.content:encoded: Elevate your next project with elite 3D assets, textures, references, and more from the Ultimate World Building Asset Bundle by ScansMatter—featuring 150 free commercial credits on ScansMatter.com, Rooftop Asset Kit, Office Environment Kit, and much more. This limited-time partnership with ScansMatter gives Humble Bundle members a unique opportunity to access countless professional-quality assets at a fraction of the price. Get the assets you need to bring your next visual project to life—and help support the World Wildlife Fund with your purchase!

item.title: Learn To Make Games in Godot 4 by GameDev.tv 2025
item.description: Godot 4 just got a lot easier
item.content:encoded: Been sitting on your game dev ambitions? Jump into this bundle of online courses from GameDev.tv, packed with expert instruction on the skills you need to develop both 2D and 3D games using Godot 4. Learn the fundamentals of game mechanics, animation, scripting, and more with hot courses like Complete Godot 3D Course: Develop Your Own 3D Games Using Godot 4. Get the expert advice and knowledge you’re looking for—and help support Oceana with your purchase!

item.title: The Complete Vibe Coding, Automation and Profit Super Bundle
item.content:encoded: Vibe Coding is the number one skill for building modern software fast. Create games, apps, and profitable SaaS projects in a fraction of the time. With Mammoth Club's ready-to-use source code and expert-crafted prompts, you'll launch faster and automate smarter. Top courses include Game Development with Godot 4 Vibe Coding, Vibe Coding Unreal Engine 5.5 Game Development, and SaaS Empire—hand picked to give you the ultimate edge. Plus, Mammoth Club just launched their new platform with achievements, AI tutors and more. Humble Bundle users get a special, exclusive achievement available for the top tier only. Don't fall behind. Get this bundle now and support Children's Miracle Network while you futureproof your skills.

item.title: Unlock Pro 3D Modeling Skills with Blender by Packt
item.content:encoded: 3D modeling has never been more popular and widely available—get into the action and start creating for yourself with our latest bundle by Packt! Render, animate, model, and more in 3D with hot Blender tutorials like Material Fundamentals - Procedural Textures in Blender 4.4, Geometry Nodes For Blender 4.4, and more. Get the professional-quality guides you need to create and manipulate 3D objects, characters, and environments, and more. Plus, your purchase helps support Alzheimer's Research UK!

item.title: Complete 2D Game Assets Bundle
item.description: Retro inspired assets for a new age
item.content:encoded: Add retro vibes to your next game project with our all-new 2D game asset bundle by ElvGames! Choose from 75+ collections of unique and exciting game assets for use in Unity, Unreal, and other popular development engines. This high-quality collection features environments, characters, meshes, models, animations, and more in a variety of styles ranging from cute to horrific. Get the assets you need to help bring your game to life, and help support the Prevent Cancer Foundation with your purchase!

item.title: 3D CAD Professional Bundle
item.content:encoded: Give your imaginary designs life—start designing like a pro with our latest 3D CAD bundle! Learn how to use powerful CAD software and take your grand design ideas from your imagination to the real world. This curated library of tutorials is highlighted by standout lessons like Ashampoo 3D CAD Professional 12, Ashampoo Home Design 10, Ashampoo 3D CAD Architecture 12, and more. Gain the skills you need to succeed in architecture and help support the American Cancer Society with your purchase.

item.title: Create, Paint and Animate Bundle
item.content:encoded: Become a modern Claude Monet with our Create, Paint, and Animate Bundle! We’ve curated a beautiful collection of brushes and assets to help you make your own digital artwork. Turn your hot ideas into fashionable prints, design your own greeting cards, or finally panel that comic book project you’ve been procrastinating on. Get professional-quality creation tools like Ultimate Brush Pack, Superhero Brush Pack, Comic Brush Pack, and—huge news—Humble Bundle purchasers get exclusive 12 month license to Clip Studio Paint Pro Version 4.0 too!

item.title: The Supreme Unreal & Unity Game Dev Bundle
item.content:encoded: Dive into an asset collection that offers the widest range of stylized towns, buildings, and more with The Supreme Unreal & Unity Game Dev Bundle! Save time and money by accessing this library of 50+ asset sets, ranging from medieval Viking villages to deserted military outposts—specific standouts include Whispering Grove Environment and Asian Dynasty Environment. Get the assets you need to help bring your game to life, and help support the charity of your choice with your purchase!

item.title: Ultimate Music Production Bundle
item.content:encoded: Rock out or chill out to your own original music with our all-new Ultimate Music Production Bundle by IK Multimedia! Unlock your inner musician and create video game soundtracks, albums, and more with help from professional-quality plugins and programs like Total Studio Essentials and MODO BASS Studio Upright. Get the instruments and tools you need to achieve the sound you’re looking for—and help support Music Will with your purchase!

item.title: Map Making MEGA Bundle
item.content:encoded: Passionate about building maps to great game worlds? Say hello to the Map Making MEGA Bundle. Whether it's starships and solar systems, entire worlds, historical maps or fantasy floorplans, this treasure trove of assets and apps has what you need for your cartography. It includes practically everything ever released by map-making experts ProFantasy Software, including the latest CC3+, seventeen Cartographer's Annual, every symbol set, dungeon, city and overland app they've ever released. Map your world and help Save the Children at the same time!
